column1: Kata Robata////Uni pasta was my last adventure
column2: and it was really nice. I'd never tried uni (sea urchin) before
column3: and I have to say it was a good first encounter. It was really creamy and delicious
column4: although it would have been nice to have bigger pieces of uni in the pasta rather than just the flavor in the sauce. Came with shrimp on top
column6: but unnecessary. This is another one that will leave you feeling full.
